assumeRole.description: ARN of the role that performs the self-service actions on your behalf. For example, `arn:aws:iam::12345678910:role/ActionRole`. To reuse the provisioned product launch role, set to `LAUNCH_ROLE`.

name.description: Name of the SSM document. For example, `AWS-RestartEC2Instance`. If you are using a shared SSM document, you must provide the ARN instead of the name.

parameters.description: List of parameters in JSON format. For example: `[{\"Name\":\"InstanceId\",\"Type\":\"TARGET\"}]` or `[{\"Name\":\"InstanceId\",\"Type\":\"TEXT_VALUE\"}]`.

type.description: Service action definition type. Valid value is `SSM_AUTOMATION`. Default is `SSM_AUTOMATION`.
